official_title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to allow post differentials to be paid to Federal employees serving on detail in the Arabian Peninsula Combat Zone in support of members of the armed forces, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Grants post differentials to Federal employees officially stationed in the United States who serve on detail in the Arabian Peninsula Combat Zone in support of members of the armed forces during a specified period irrespective of the number of days that such employee serves on that detail.

titles.title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to allow post differentials to be paid to Federal employees serving on detail in the Arabian Peninsula Combat Zone in support of members of the armed forces, and for other purposes.
